home.message:
We can’t wait to share this special day with you.
 Come celebrate a late-summer night with us.

story.title: Our Story
story.hint: Explore the illustration to discover our journey
story.wisdom: Love is patient, love is kind. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
entries: The day we first met — a moment that changed everything.
Our first adventure together — the start of something beautiful.
The moment we knew — when words weren't needed anymore.
Growing together — building a life side by side.
The proposal — a question and an answer that lasts forever.

travel.title: Travel
travel.message:
We know that traveling for a destination wedding can take extra time and planning, and we completely understand if you’re not able to join us in person. We are so grateful for your love and well wishes.

If you’re able to make the trip, we’re so excited to celebrate together! Below you’ll find directions to the venue and a few places to stay.
travel.flightsBody: Kahului Airport (OGG) is the main airport on Maui. Wailea is about a 25–30 minute drive from the airport.
travel.flightsLayover: There are not many direct flights to Maui from most cities — you'll likely connect through Honolulu (HNL) before a short 45-minute hop to Kahului.

gettingAround.heading: Rental Car
gettingAround.body: If you're planning to explore the island before or after the wedding, we recommend renting a car so you can fully enjoy Maui's beaches, scenic drives, and hidden gems.

gettingAround.heading: Rideshare
gettingAround.body: If you'd rather keep things simple, Uber and Lyft are available and can take you directly to the venue and around Wailea.

hotel.name: Hotel Wailea
hotel.description: We're getting married at Hotel Wailea, and have special discounted rates for our guests. Book through the Hotel Wailea website and enter the promo code below. The discount code is valid between August 25 - September 2, 2026.
hotel.note: We'd love for everyone to stay close by and make a weekend of it, so we recommend booking early before rooms fill up.

travel.altHotelsNote: If you're looking for other options, there are lots of great places to stay nearby in Wailea too — whatever works best for you!

altHotels.name: Residence Inn By Marriott Maui Wailea

tips: Late August in Maui is warm and sunny — expect temperatures around 85°F (29°C).
Don't forget reef-safe sunscreen! Hawaii law requires it to protect the coral reefs.
If you're extending your trip, the Road to Hana, Haleakalā sunrise, and snorkeling at Molokini are must-dos.

events.title: Ceremony
events.description: Join us as we say our vows

events.title: Cocktail Hour
events.description: Drinks and light bites while we take photos

registry.title: Registry
registry.message: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all. If you wish to honor us with a gift, we've created a small registry.

storyBook.title: Our Story
storyBook.subtitle: The chapters that led us here

chapters.label: Chapter One
chapters.title: A Chance Encounter
chapters.text: Some stories begin with a grand gesture, but ours started with a quiet moment — a glance across a room, an unexpected conversation, and the feeling that something had just shifted.

chapters.label: Chapter Two
chapters.title: First Adventures
chapters.text: What started as coffee dates turned into long weekends exploring new places together. Every trip revealed something new — not just about the world, but about each other.

chapters.label: Chapter Three
chapters.title: Growing Together
chapters.text: Life isn't always easy, but facing it together made all the difference. Through late nights, big moves, and quiet evenings at home, we built something that felt unshakeable.

chapters.label: Chapter Four
chapters.title: The Question
chapters.text: There are moments you replay in your mind forever. A heartbeat of silence before the answer, and then — everything changed, and nothing changed at all.

chapters.label: Chapter Five
chapters.title: The Next Chapter
chapters.text: And now we stand at the beginning of something new. With all of you beside us, we're ready to write the rest of this story — together.
